thread.title: Canada's Shaw Communications posts loss on restructuring charges

title: Canada's Shaw Communications posts loss on restructuring charges
text:
April 12, 2018 / 12:09 PM / Updated 3 minutes ago Canada's Shaw Communications posts loss on restructuring charges Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 12 (Reuters) - Canadian telecom company Shaw Communications Inc reported a quarterly loss on Thursday after it recorded restructuring charges of C$417 million ($331.3 million). 
The Calgary-based company reported a net loss of C$164 million, or a loss of 33 Canadian cents per share, in its fiscal second quarter ended Feb. 28, compared with a profit of C$147 million, or 30 Canadian cents per share, a year earlier. 
Revenue rose 12.4 percent to C$1.36 billion. $1 = 1.2578 Canadian dollars $1 = 1.2586 Canadian dollars Reporting by Ahmed Farhatha
